sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { UseAppState } from '../appContext' import { FaClinicMedical, FaCar, FaTruck, FaHamburger, FaHome, FaGift, FaChild, FaTshirt, FaNewspaper } from "react-icons/fa"; import { CategoryStyle } from './CategoryStyle' import { categoryProps } from '../types/types' import './category.css' function Categories(props: categoryProps) { const {text} = props const {state, dispatch} = UseAppState() const getexpense =(e: React.MouseEvent, txt)=> { alert(`WHat the hell ${e}`) dispatch({type:'category_click',payload: {text: txt} }) } return ( getexpense(e)}> { text === 'First Aid' ? : text === 'Automobile' ? : text === 'Transport' ? : text === 'Food' ? : text === 'Rent' ? : text === 'Gifts' ? : text === 'Child Care' ? : text === 'Clothing' ? : } { text } ) } export default Categories
